title: Record-setting day of postseason homers
text:
> Sports Record-setting day of postseason homers Chicago Cubs center fielder Dexter Fowler (24) hits a home run against the St. Louis Cardinals during the eighth inning of Game 3 in baseball's National League Division Series, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
